mapper.select: SELECT m_userid as coUserid, co_text as coText, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(),tb_comment.co_regdate) as coRegdate FROM tb_comment JOIN tb_member ON m_idx=co_useridx WHERE co_mcidx=${mcidx};

SELECT mc_idx, m_userid as mc_useridx, mc_content,mc_taggedid,mc_taggedname, mc_regdate, mc_location, mc_imageurl FROM tb_mycontent JOIN tb_member on mc_useridx=m_idx ORDER BY tb_mycontent.mc_regdate LIMIT #{start}, 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment(co_useridx, co_mcidx, co_text) VALUES (#{co_useridx}, #{co_mcidx}, #{co_text})
